amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the Family Housing Operation and Maintenance, Air Force, account to emphasize the importance of housing oversight.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rodgers (WA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rodgers (WA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
